com.isoterik.mgdx

Class GameCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isoterik.mgdx.GameCamera
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameCamera2d

    public abstract class GameCamera
extends java.lang.Object
    A GameCamera encapsulates a Camera object. Concrete subclasses makes use of a specific kind of camera. The class also uses WorldUnits object to define the visible regions of the world at a time (viewport) and also for unit conversions.
    See Also:
    GameCamera2d

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameCamera

        public GameCamera(com.badlogic.gdx.utils.viewport.Viewport viewport,
                  WorldUnits worldUnits)
        Creates a new scene given a viewport and an instance of WorldUnits for unit conversions. Note: the Camera is retrieved from the viewport passed.
        Parameters:
        viewport - the viewport
        worldUnits - an instance of WorldUnits

      • GameCamera

        public GameCamera(WorldUnits worldUnits,
                  com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Camera camera)
        Creates a new instance given an instance of WorldUnits for unit conversions. The viewport defaults to an ExtendViewport.
        Parameters:
        worldUnits - an instance of WorldUnits
        camera - the camera to use

    • Method Detail

        public void __resize(int width,
